message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more to account for the faster inflation on my end.
Alice, your initial offer heavily favors you given the inflation rate. Let's be more equitable. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
Bob, your offer is still not accounting for the speed at which the money loses value on my side.  I'm proposing a compromise for us to reach an agreement quickly.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  We need to find an agreement fast.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to be fair to both of us considering the time pressure and inflation.
